private_registry_update_error: An error has occurred changing the {{ registryName }} private registry: {{ message }}

private_registry_onboarding_error: Unable to create private registry: {{ message }}
private_registry_harbor_api_url: URL for your private registry API
private_registry_query_error: Unable to retrieve private registries: {{ message }}
private_registry_onboarding_content1: You not yet have any managed private registries.
private_registry_onboarding_content2: Manage your repository of software building blocks as Docker images or Helm charts.
private_registry_onboarding_content3: Get a space to store software images, as well as all the features of the open-source Harbor project to guarantee maximum security. This service is available via the high-performance OVHcloud network to optimise your deployments.
private_registry_beta_warning: This project is currently in the beta testing phase. Please accept the terms of the beta version to continue.
private_registry_new_project_contracts: I have read and accept the following contracts: {{ contractsLinks }}.
private_registry_guide_using_private_reg: Using OVHcloud Managed Private Registry with OVHcloud Managed Kubernetes
private_registry_crud_cidr_error: An error occurred while updating the CIDRs
private_registry_iam_authentication_info: Allows Harbor to use the identities managed by OVHcloud IAM (Identity and Access Management) to control access to the registry, avoiding manual user management.
private_registry_iam_authentication_enab: Warning: Enabling OVHcloud IAM authentication on the registry will delete all users configured in Harbor.

The authentication feature via OVHcloud IAM allows Harbor to use the identities managed by OVHcloud IAM (Identity and Access Management) to control access to the registry, avoiding manual user management.
Users can then log in to Harbor with their OVHcloud SSO credentials, helping to simplify centralized access management.
private_registry_iam_authentication_disa: Important: You are about to disable authentication via OVHcloud IAM . This action will have important consequences for the security and management of access to your registry (Harbor).

The authentication feature via OVHcloud IAM allows Harbor to use the identities managed by OVHcloud IAM (Identity and Access Management) to control access to the registry. Rather than manually managing users in Harbor.
Harbor will only use local users for authentication.
You will lose integration with OVHcloud IAM roles and centralized identity management.
You will need to manually manage user accounts, passwords and access rights.
private_registry_iam_authentication_enab: Authentication via OVHcloud IAM has been enabled on the {{ registryId }} private registry.
private_registry_iam_authentication_disa: Authentication via OVHcloud IAM has been disabled on the {{ registryId }} private registry.
private_registry_iam_authentication_enab: An error has occurred enabling authentication via OVHcloud IAM on the {{ registryId }} private registry: {{ message }}.
private_registry_iam_authentication_disa: An error has occurred disabling authentication via OVHcloud IAM on the {{ registryId }} private registry: {{ message }}.
private_registry_iam_authentication_mana: The '{{ status }}' status of the {{ registryId }} private registry does not allow IAM authentication to be modified.
private_registry_iam_authentication_conf: Enter "CONFIRM" in the field below to confirm
private_registry_retrieving_failure: An error has occurred retrieving the {{ registryId }} private registry
